title: Course for Developing Spatial Visualization and Sequential Arrangement Skills Using Drone Programming (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic programming concepts and possession of 3D spatial awareness
context.additional_context: Tablet-based block programming tools in BYOD environments, with virtual drone operation training via VR simulations

learning_goals: Achievement of drone path programming ability using 3D spatial coordinates (80%+ accuracy).
Acquisition of logical flight sequence structuring skills using sequencing blocks (20% improvement in pre-post tests).
Successful completion of real-time spatial problem-solving assessments in VR simulation environments (minimum 3 scenarios passed).

resources: Drone Programming Software Based on Tynker or Scratch

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
